name: DimiD
description:
DimiD is a platformer game where like many other games you can move and jump, but DimiD comes with an special move. You can travel to the mirror dimension with one button.

DimiD is a game born as winner from a GameJam with "The Upside-Down" as theme.

Play DimiD to challenge your platforming skills and try to beat the Demo with all the tokens in the less time.
